caption.center: DANION T. LENNON, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal of order denying rule 3.850 motion from the Circuit Court for the Seventeenth Judicial Circuit, Broward County; Paul L. Backman, Judge; L.T. Case No. 01-18356CF10A.
opinion.attorneys:
Danion T. Lennon, Chipley, pro se.
No appearance required for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
GROSS, C.J., MAY and DAMOORGIAN, JJ., concur.
Not final until disposition of timely filed motion for rehearing.Page 1
